mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectOrdGodSvcDetailCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ORD_NO , ORD_GOD_TURN , SVC_QTY , SVC_AMT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM ORD_GOD_SVC_DETAIL_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND ORD_NO = #{ordNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ORD_GOD_TURN = #{ordGodTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
